document.docAuthor: Pérez-Benavides, A. Lucía, Hernández-Baz, Fernando, González, Jorge M. & Riverón, Alejandro Zaldívar
document.masterDocTitle: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Updated taxonomic checklist of Chalcidoidea (Hymenoptera) associated with Bruchinae (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts.
Acanthoscelides
sp. ( DeSantis 1967 );
Acanthoscelides alboscutellatus (Horn)
(Bissel 1940;
Muesebeck et al. 1951
) in Lugwigia sp. ( Gibson 2011 );

on

*;

on
Mimosa
nr
laxiflora Benth.
,

, and
Mimosa laxiflora Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )
*;

on

(DC.) Benth. ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 )*;

on

*;

on

from seeds of

sp. ( Gibson 2011 );

Distribution. INDO-AUSTRALIAN: United States of America ( Hawaii ). NEARCTIC: Canada ( Ontario ), United States of America (Albama, Arizona , Arkansas , California , Delaware , District of Columbia , Florida, Georgia , Illinois, Indiana, Kansas, Kentucky, Lousiana, Maryland, Michigan, Mississippi, Missouri, New Jersey, New Mexico, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Oklahoma, Oregon, Penssylvania, South Carolina, Tennesse, Texas, Utah, Virginia, Wet Virginia, Wisconsin). NEOTROPICAL: Argentina , Brazil , Colombia , Guatemala , Honduras * ( Hetz & Johnson 1988 ), Mexico , Nicaragua , Panama , Peru , Puerto Rico , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Trinidad and Tobago , Uruguay .
